Author: ashaed31
Text: A few reasons:  1) You're stressed, meaning you will be more likely to gain and retain weight. 2) You're not getting enough sleep, meaning you will be more likely to gain and retain weight. 3) You could be retaining water weight because of your period. 4) It could literally just be water weight. I had a couple instances where I stayed the same weight for 10 days straight and suddenly lost 2 pounds overnight. Don't sweat it.
